document.full_text: texas governor rick perry called on texans to pray for rain as cooler temperatures on thursday helped firefighters contain wildfires that have charred more than 1.5 million acres across the state.
document.title: texas governor calls for prayers for rain amid fires
lines_and_colors: texas governor rick perry called on texans to pray for rain as cooler temperatures on thursday helped firefighters contain wildfires that have charred more than 1.5 million acres across the state.
